footer.contact: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.
footer.whatsappshare: Report your health status to help fighting against the Covid-19!

renewReport.daysSince: It has been {days} days since your last report.
renewReport.explainOther: If you want to file a report for someone else, please use another phone, tablet or computer.

provideTokenModal.header: We hope that you are feeling great!
provideTokenModal.text: Enter your code to update the report:

report.question: Question

start.header: Self-report your health condition to help stop the spread of the COVID-19

question-1.question: How high is your body temperature?

question-2.question: Have you recently developed a cough?

question-3.question: Have you recently developed difficulty breathing or shortness of breath?
question-3.option-2: Yes, I feel breathless during light exertion but not at rest
question-3.option-3: Yes, I feel a little breathless while resting
question-3.option-4: Yes, I feel breathless all the time

question-4.question: How are your general energy levels?
question-4.option-2: I’m tired but up and about
question-4.option-3: I’m mostly in bed but can manage to get up for short periods
question-4.option-4: I’m in bed but I manage to go to the toilet
question-4.option-5: I can’t get out of bed

question-5.question: Have you had close contact with someone infected with coronavirus (covid-19)?

question-6.question: Do you have any of the following ongoing illnesses?

question-7.question: Do you have a weakened immune system?
question-7.help: For example, do you medicate with cytostatic drugs, cortisone tablets, autoimmune disease drugs such as arthritis or the like?   Have you ever had an organ transplant, had the spleen removed, have untreated HIV or other conditions that impairthe immune system?

results.result: You have indicated that you haveone or more underlying health problems that may put you at greater risk of severe disease if you become infected with the new coronavirus. Ensure you keep up your regular medications to control your illness and follow social distancing recommendations.Link to recommednations for risk groups:

report.title: Report
report.intro: Help fighting against the new Coronavirus in Switzerland by self-reporting your health status.
report.contract: Did you contract Covid-19 and recovered?
report.notSick: Great! Stay at home even if you're not sick to avoid propagation.
report.contracted: Regarding your recent social contacts, do you think you contracted Covid-19?
report.contractedOfficialConfirmText: Have you been officially tested positive to Covid-19 by a recognized medical institution?
report.locationValidError: Please enter a valid Swiss postal number
report.errorDetails: An error occurred when sending your data
report.sentComeBack: Thank you for your contribution. Please come back if your health status changes.
report.sentSomeoneElse: If you want to file a report for someone else, please use another phone, tablet or computer.
report.sentMistake: You've made a mistake ? You can correct it :

visualize.title: Visualize
visualize.dataWarning: The following data is community collected and not verified.

about.title: About us
about.headWho: We are a team of swiss developers
about.who: that want to help to evaluate the current situation of the COVID-19 pandemic in our country.
about.needYou: Our app is based on your self-reporting... so it is important that you update your health status in case of change.
about.headData: We don’t save any personal information in our servers!
about.data: Every data is anonymous but to keep our datasets consistent, we need that you always use the same browser to update your status (otherwise you will be counted twice).
about.dataUpdate: We will update the numbers as frequently as we can. But, you will need to wait a bit especially during the beginning phase of the app.
about.publicData: our dataset is public and open in our github. Please use it to make your own awesome visualization, or join our effort to open up in other countries
about.dataCare: keep in mind that our dataset is based on self-reporting from the community, thus the data is not official and could contains errors. The data is only intended to be used as an indicator.
about.improvement: for improvements or you want to report an error, please contact us on Facebook.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.goalQuestion: What is the goal of this app?
faq.goalResponse: We aim to provide a visualization of the progression of the Covid-19 pandemic in our country. How can we 'flatten the curve' without having a statistical idea of the current situation? Help us by publishing your health status.
faq.othersQuestion: How do I report other members of my family?
faq.othersResponse: We are working on this issue. For now, you can use a different devices (phones, tablet, computer) for each member of your family.
